item.title: First Blog Post
item.description: library(reticulate) Sys.setenv(RETICULATE_PYTHON = "/usr/bin/python") use_python("usr/bin/python") While taking this class, I learned the basics of using Python, a programming language that can be used to create websites, web applications and general-purpose programming tasks. The language emphasizes the readability of code, and utilizies significant whitespace. Python can also be used via R Studio by using the “reticulate” package. One of Python’s basic built-in functions is to create lists. Using this list function, I can figure out the length of a list.
